title: Extend MessageType enum with new message types
description: Add new message types to MessageType enum in Message entity: IMAGE, VIDEO, AUDIO, STICKER, REACTION, MEDIA_SHARE. These types will be used to categorize different message formats supported by Instagram API.
dod: MessageType enum extended with new types: IMAGE, VIDEO, AUDIO, STICKER, REACTION, MEDIA_SHARE
Existing code using MessageType still compiles without errors

notes: Ensure backward compatibility with existing messages
